quest.name: A Treat of Trout
journal: Lyngsath wants you to cook for a fellow culinarian.

Lyngsath informs you that Ingham, a senior of yours at the guild, has been inconsolable since botching an order. Wishing to cheer him up, the guildmaster bids you make the poor soul one of his favorite dishes: grilled trout.

Instead of cheering him up, your expertly prepared grilled trout has the wholly unintended effect of humiliating Ingham, who interprets the gesture as a form of challenge. Happily, his urge to better your efforts prompts him to forget his woes, and he gifts you an amateur's culinary knife, that you might compete on an even footing. Now armed with a secondary tool, you continue along your chosen path.

※The next culinarian quest will be available from Lyngsath upon reaching level 10.
objectives: Deliver a grilled trout to Ingham.

dialogue.name: LYNGSATH
dialogue.text: Ye've come at a good time, Forename. Just so 'appens I need yer 'elp with somethin'.

dialogue.name: LYNGSATH
dialogue.text: One of our chefs buggered up an order a bit ago, an' 'e's been down in the dumps ever since.

dialogue.name: LYNGSATH
dialogue.text: Ingham, 'is name is─joined the guild a few moons afore you did. Determined lad, but don't take failure too well.

dialogue.name: LYNGSATH
dialogue.text: Anyroad, we can't 'ave 'im cryin' into 'is soup─plays 'avoc with the seasonin', see─so I wants ye to try an' cheer 'im up. An' there's naught like a good meal to take a man's mind off 'is many failin's.

dialogue.name: LYNGSATH
dialogue.text: A nice bit o' grilled trout should do the trick─'tis one of 'is favorites. Aye...if ye was to cook 'im up a plate o' that, I reckon 'e'd find the experience 'ighly motivatin'.

dialogue.name: LYNGSATH
dialogue.text: The main ingredient, princess trout, can be 'ad at the Hyaline. As fer Ingham, ye'll find 'im workin' in the kitchens. Prepare the dish, an' take it to 'im. 'Appy grillin'.

dialogue.name: INGHAM
dialogue.text: What is it? A grilled trout...for me? Well, yes, I am quite fond of the dish, but what have I done to deserve it?

dialogue.name: INGHAM
dialogue.text: The guildmaster thought it would cheer me up, you say? Hmph! Well meaning though he may be, food is not the solution to every woe. But come, let us see your handiwork. It is my duty as your senior to give you counsel, after all.

dialogue.name: INGHAM
dialogue.text:
Surely not...
You made this? Truly? The aroma...<sniff> <sniff>...it's delightful.

dialogue.name: INGHAM
dialogue.text: And the skin─ever so slightly charred, just as it should be... Twelve save me, the thought of sinking my teeth into that crispy layer...and tasting the tender flesh beneath...ohhh...MMMMMM...

dialogue.name: INGHAM
dialogue.text: <slurp> Beg pardons. A-As I was saying, this is quite...impressive. In fact, I doubt even the guildmaster would be able to fault it─trust me, I know.

dialogue.name: INGHAM
dialogue.text: But...I don't understand it. You've been here scarcely long enough to learn syrup making, yet you're already capable of...of this?

dialogue.name: INGHAM
dialogue.text: Do you know how long it took me to achieve the same? Six bleeding moons!

dialogue.name: INGHAM
dialogue.text: Gods, am I so utterly devoid of talent? No... No, I will not be outdone by a mere novice! I refuse to be outdone!

dialogue.name: INGHAM
dialogue.text: ...Ahem. My apologies. I thank you for the trout...and would have you accept this knife from me.

dialogue.name: INGHAM
dialogue.text: Use it in conjunction with your skillet and your cooking experience will be much enhanced.

dialogue.name: INGHAM
dialogue.text: Do not mistake it for a gift. It is payment for the trout─nothing more. Besides, it would give me no pleasure to get the better of a womanman who wasn't properly equipped. Now, leave me be─I have stock to take!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Certain gear grants bonuses to your craftsmanship, control, and CP values.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: A higher craftsmanship rating hastens the progress of synthesis; greater control increases the chance of creating high-quality items; and additional CP improves your crafting stamina.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Outfitting yourself with an eye to your current objective will increase the efficiency of your crafting endeavors.
